item.title: Sawmill Drive Roller In The Making
item.description: The crew machines and assembles a brand-new drive roller for a sawmill, combining precision engineering and craftsmanship to keep the mill running smoothly.

media:content.media:title: Sawmill Drive Roller In The Making
media:content.media:description: The crew machines and assembles a brand-new drive roller for a sawmill, combining precision engineering and craftsmanship to keep the mill running smoothly.

item.title: Shop-Made Tools: Making a BT50 Tool Holder
item.description: The team fabricates a custom BT50 tool holder from scratch, showcasing precise machining, expert craftsmanship, and clever problem-solving in the workshop.

item.title: Can We Save This Cylinder?
item.description: A tough challenge hits the workshop as a hydraulic cylinder arrives completely seized, the team works carefully to free it and see if it can be restored.

item.title: Repairing a cracked CAT 789 suspension part!
item.description: A critical suspension component from a CAT 789 arrives with a serious crack, watch the full repair process from inspection to precision welding and rebuild.

item.title: This Bulldozer Blade Needed a Massive Repair
item.description: A heavily damaged bulldozer blade comes into the workshop for major repairs, requiring welding, machining, and plenty of heavy lifting to bring it back to life.

item.title: Fabricating a hydraulic pump bracket for the Franna crane
item.description: The team at Cutting Edge Engineering builds a custom hydraulic pump bracket for a Franna crane, showcasing precision fabrication and top-notch workshop skills.

item.title: Our hydraulic press sprung a massive leak!
item.description: A major hydraulic leak brings the workshop to a halt. Watch how the team inspects, diagnoses, and repairs the press to get it running smoothly again.

item.title: Straightening bent metal using our hydraulic press is very satisfying!
item.description: Watch as the team uses their powerful hydraulic press to straighten bent metal with precision, a process that’s as satisfying as it is impressive.

item.title: Manufacturing a Bigger Boring Bar
item.description: See how a larger, stronger boring bar is designed and built from the ground up to handle heavy machining jobs with ease.

item.title: Damaged Thread Repair on a 992G Wheel Loader
item.description: A worn thread on a 992G wheel loader needs careful restoration. Watch how precision machining brings this critical component back to spec.

item.title: Repairing Cast Iron — A Tricky Task
item.description: Cast iron repairs demand patience and precision. Follow the process as we tackle one of the toughest materials in the shop.

item.title: Can This Cylinder Rod Be Saved?
item.description: A damaged cylinder rod challenges our repair skills — can we restore it to working condition, or is it beyond saving?

item.title: Machining an Induction Layer by Hand
item.description: Old-school machining meets modern technique — see how the induction layer takes shape through precise manual work

item.title: Custom Rotary Ground Clamp for Welding
item.description: Creating our own rotary ground clamp to make welding smoother and more reliable — built from scratch and built to last.

item.title: Manual Machining: Induction Layer in Action
item.description: A look into the manual machining process behind the induction layer — skill, precision, and craftsmanship at work.

item.title: Building a Rotary Ground Clamp for Welding
item.description: From concept to creation — watch how we design and build a custom rotary ground clamp to improve welding precision and efficiency.

item.title: Our 150-Tonne Hydraulic Press Has an Issue
item.description: When heavy machinery falters, precision matters. See how we troubleshoot and fix a problem with our powerful 150-tonne hydraulic press.

item.title: Damaged Inside: Mining Truck Cylinder Barrel
item.description: A closer look inside a massive mining truck cylinder barrel reveals unexpected internal damage — here’s how we assess and plan the repair.

item.title: Machining a Huge Cylinder Rod for a Hitachi EX1900
item.description: Watch the process of machining a massive cylinder rod for a Hitachi EX1900, showcasing precision engineering at its finest.

item.title: It's Mail Time: Unboxing What Fans Sent Us!
item.description: From tools to surprises, we’re opening packages from our amazing fans — see what’s inside and who sent what!
